text: Wai Ching Ho (born 16 November 1943) is a Hong Kong actress. She is known for her role as Madame Gao in the Marvel Cinematic Universe in Daredevil (2015â€“2016), Iron Fist (2017) and The Defenders (2017). ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Hong Kong actors
title: Wai Ching Ho
